track.name: To Be With You
comments: I will make this my most played song evah!!
Waited on a line of greens and blues.
this live version sounded like Steve Tyler at the beginning
Nostaligia. I think I was 10 when this track came out, one of the first English songs I loved ! And what conditioner does the shiny-smooth hair guy use ?
Hee hee FloydFTM.....hope things improved with practice!!!!!!! lol
This takes me back to losing my virginity, fond memories though this song probably lasted longer than I did!!!
Met then for autographs on this tour at the Carson Mall in SoCal. Great Day!
Christ how I adore the chorus to this one. Oh and Paul Gilbert is a guitar genius.
Another song that Mike Jackson could of sang ??????? l.o.l.
